required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Investigate Relative Bioavailability of Different Formulations of SHR6390 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-centre, Single Dose, Randomized, Open-label, Three Period, Six Sequence, Cross Controlled Study to Assess the Relative Bioavailability of the New and Traditional Formulations on SHR6390 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate relative bioavailability during the new and traditional formulations of SHR6390 in healthy subjects

primary_outcome.description: Relative bioavailability of the two new formulations on SHR6390
Area under the concentration-time curve from time zero to time t of SHR6390
Area under the concentration-time curve extrapolated to infinity of SHR6390

arm_group.description: Intervention: Drug: SHR6390 new formulation 1(T1) in the first period; SHR6390 new formulation 2 (T2) in the second period; SHR6390 traditional formulation (R) in the last period
Intervention: Drug: SHR6390 traditional formulation (R) in the first period; SHR6390 new formulation 1 (T1) in the second period; SHR6390 new formulation 2 (T2) in the last period
Intervention: Drug: SHR6390 new formulation 2(T2) in the first period; SHR6390 traditional formulation (R) in the second period; SHR6390 new formulation 1 (T1) in the last period
Intervention: Drug: SHR6390 new formulation 1(T1) in the first period; SHR6390 traditional formulation (R) in the second period; SHR6390 new formulation 2 (T2) in the last period
Intervention: Drug: SHR6390 new formulation 2(T2) in the first period; SHR6390 new formulation 1 (T1) in the second period; SHR6390 traditional formulation (R) in the last period
Intervention: Drug: SHR6390 traditional formulation (R) in the first period; SHR6390 new formulation 2 (T2) in the second period; SHR6390 new formulation 1 (T1) in the last period

intervention.description: SHR6390 new formulation 1(T1) , SHR6390 new formulation 2 (T2) and SHR6390 traditional formulatin were given in a single dose over three cycles
